text: In a landmark , the Competition Commission of India ( CCI ) has Google ’s request to an antitrust ruling against the tech ’s Android system . [[ ]] decision marks a major the tech giant , been at center of an anti - investigation since . The company had sought injunction to prevent its decision , which had been 2020 , that the company its market power by requiring to pre - install certain apps . [[ ]] In ruling , Competition Commission India found Google ’s Android system was used give search an unfair over its rivals . CCI argued that Google use its store as a monopoly to force device manufacturers to install Google apps stifled competition in the . Google had sought to block the , arguing the anti - behavior “ unfounded ” that it was not a fair before the CCI . The CCI , however , ruled against Google , noting that it had conducted a thorough investigation before against the tech giant . In response to the ruling , Google said a was disappointed the decision and that it “ will continue to defend our ability to freely develop and offer to to ensure that remains open platform . ” The company also said would review the decision and its options . The Competition Commission is a major victory for the anti - monopoly movement and could have far - reaching for other tech such , Apple , and Facebook . It also serves as a warning tech that they must antitrust laws or the consequences . [[ ]] The ruling at a time when there is focus on the of Tech , with the US and EU launching antitrust investigations into a number tech . Google is facing antitrust investigations in both the US Europe , US Department of Justice filing a the company . [[ ]] Google has also been hit with antitrust fines in the . 2018 , the Commission fined Google € 4.3 billion ( $ 5.1 billion ) for abusing its power with its Android operating system . The also stop device makers to pre - install Google Search and the Chrome on their devices . In response to the ruling , Ajit , CEO Google India , said company respects the decision of the commission that it “ committed to an , competitive , and vibrant app . ” He added that Google would continue work with partners that users in India had access to a range of and services . The CCI ruling a landmark decision that is to have - reaching implications for tech giants do business India . an important precedent and sends a strong message that the anti - monopoly movement is alive and well . It will be interesting to how the decision future behavior of tech giants in across the world .

text: The huge omnibus that was unveiled contains an important series of provisions to help Americans save . Buried in the 4,100 page bill is the " Secure 2.0 " plan which , among , require employers to automatically enroll employees in their 401(k ) plan at a rate of least 3 % but than % of their salary . Businesses with 10 or fewer employees or in business less three would excluded . Does n't sound like , it 's a potentially leap in helping the retirement crisis . You can a University Chicago , Thaler , for helping popularize . Thaler is of the fathers of behavioral , which studies how people , how they are supposed to behave . One of those insights is that humans tend not to action when they should : is a lot " inertia " human decisions . Thaler designed many " nudges " that helped spur people do things beneficial to . Like more money for retirement . Thaler ' nudge ' - sponsored 401(k ) plans have been the 1970s , but a lot workers n't sign up for them , even when offer matching . Not up made sense , except understood that often do n't act their own self - interest . " nudge , " he suggested some 20 years ago , was : automatically enrolled in the program , unless they opt out . Congress on that suggestion : the Protection Act of 2006 employers to adopt automatic enrollment plans . It caught on , and adopted the idea . Enrollment went . Today , about 6 in 10 employers offer automatic . A 2021 Vanguard study found that 91 % of new hires stay the plan when automatic , compared with 28 % firms contributions . also to contributions over time . Secure 2.0 further codifies that into law . Americans do n't save enough for retirement Remember the old " three " for retirement : personal savings , a pension and Social Security . That mostly gone . young have pensions . The average Social Security is check $ 1,400 a month , not to get by for people . That personal . We need more " nudges " get people to save more . 2.0 provisions would also create bigger " catch - " for older workers , allowing workers an extra $ 10,000 a year once they are over 50 ( the current limit is $ ) . It would increase the age Required Minimum Distributions would start , first to 73 from the , and 75 in 2033 . you , Richard Thaler won Nobel Memorial Prize in Sciences in 2017 his to understanding human behavior . He has spent a lifetime studying irrational behavior , but when he won the he joked that he intended spend the prize " as irrationally possible . " There a man who not only understands people , understands himself .
